body_html:
Thanks, after re-use the following commands, then built and installed successfully.
1)export PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.2/bin${PATH:+:${PATH}}
2)export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64
${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}}
Actually, them has been used before. But after restart, seems lost again. Is there a way to fix them in the system, thanks.
